FOUND IN: Yin energy within a duality of yin-yang balance (from Chinese philosophy)
Pistol: A small-caliber, often semi-automatic handgun that is compact and easy to carry.
Acres: A unit for measuring large tracts of land, equaling 43,560 square feet or approximately 1 acre.
Hydra - The multi-headed serpent in Greek mythology that was slain by Heracles as one of his Twelve Labors
